title: Game starting without sound
body: I usually listen to music during the loading screen from YouTube and it sometimes loads me into game without sound at all, I try to adjust and or reset my sound in game but no avail. The only option is to disconnect and reconnect and even that doesn't work 100% of the times. Any solutions

replies.body: Are you using nay comm programs like Skype that would automatically adjust or mute volume settings?  Aside from that I'm not really sure what would be causing this.  I'm thinking this may be more of a PC issue than league, but can't say for sure.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this with you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.

Ive been having thihs same issue but even when discord or skype isnt loaded.  And its not regular.  Most of the time i get sound.  And then randomly i wont in game, and it lasts the whole game.  Runnin Win 10, if that helps.
I occasionally use Discord but sometimes it's fine sometimes it ain't when I do
